mapper.select: SELECT a.comment_id, a.content, a.created_at, a.updated_at, a.user_no, b.user_id, a.parent_comment_id, a.travel_mate_post_id FROM comment a JOIN user b ON (a.user_no = b.user_no) WHERE a.is_deleted = 'N' AND a.travel_mate_post_id = #{ travelMatePostId }
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comment WHERE travel_mate_post_id = #{ travelMatePostId }
